unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post on "Yoga Practices" in the "Lifestyle & Wellness" category:
normalised: What are some simple yet effective Yoga practices that I can incorporate into my daily routine for better overall wellbeing?

unnormalised: **What are some simple yet effective Yoga practices that I can incorporate into my daily routine for better overall wellbeing?**
normalised: Namaste everyone! So glad you asked! Yoga is a fantastic way to boost both your physical and mental health, and you don't need to be a yogi from Rishikesh to reap the benefits.

unnormalised: Namaste everyone! So glad you asked! Yoga is a fantastic way to boost both your physical and mental health, and you don't need to be a yogi from Rishikesh to reap the benefits.
normalised: Here are a few simple practices I swear by:

unnormalised: Here are a few simple practices I swear by:
normalised: *   **Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation):** A classic! Even just five rounds in the morning can energize you for the whole day. It works almost every muscle group!

unnormalised: *   **Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation):** A classic! Even just 5 rounds in the morning can energize you for the whole day. It works almost every muscle group!
normalised: *   **Deep Breathing (Pranayama):** Anulom Vilom (alternate nostril breathing) is amazing for calming the mind. Try five to ten minutes daily. It can be practiced anywhere from your five hundred square foot apartment to a park.

unnormalised: *   **Deep Breathing (Pranayama):** Anulom Vilom (alternate nostril breathing) is amazing for calming the mind. Try 5-10 minutes daily. It can be practiced anywhere - from your 500 sq ft apartment to a park.
normalised: *   **Gentle Stretching:** Simple stretches like neck rolls, shoulder rotations, and a forward bend can release tension, especially if you're working at a desk all day.

unnormalised: *   **Gentle Stretching:** Simple stretches like neck rolls, shoulder rotations, and a forward bend can release tension, especially if you're working at a desk all day.
normalised: *   **Mindfulness Meditation:** Even five minutes of focusing on your breath can drastically reduce stress. I use a meditation app recommended by Doctor Sharma from A I I M S.

unnormalised: *   **Mindfulness Meditation:** Even 5 minutes of focusing on your breath can drastically reduce stress. I use a meditation app recommended by Dr. Sharma from AIIMS.
normalised: *   **Child's Pose (Balasana):** A great way to wind down before bed. Hold for a minute or two, focusing on relaxing your body.

unnormalised: *   **Child's Pose (Balasana):** A great way to wind down before bed. Hold for a minute or two, focusing on relaxing your body.
normalised: Remember to listen to your body and don’t push yourself too hard, especially when you’re starting out. Maybe even consult a certified yoga instructor, like the ones in Mysore, for personalized guidance. The investment of around rupee two thousand a month for a good class is worth it.

unnormalised: Remember to listen to your body and don’t push yourself too hard, especially when you’re starting out. Maybe even consult a certified yoga instructor, like the ones in Mysore, for personalized guidance. The investment of around Rs. 2000 a month for a good class is worth it.
normalised: These small changes can make a huge difference to your wellbeing. Let me know in the comments which yoga asanas work best for you!

unnormalised: These small changes can make a huge difference to your wellbeing. Let me know in the comments which yoga asanas work best for you!
